comments: Number of 10-subsequences of [ 1, n ] with just 1 contiguous pair.1625*a(n) is the number of permutations of (n+1) symbols that 8-commute with an (n+1)-cycle (see A233440 for definition), where 1625 = A000757(8). - _Luis Manuel Rivera Mart√≠nez_, Feb 07 2014
